snippet.title: Goemon's Great Adventure Trailer 1999
snippet.description:
Goemon's Great Adventure Trailer 1999

Official Content From Konami

Goeman, that spiky haired pipe wielding wild child returns. Piggyback your way through a fight - one player steers while the other attacks. You can even unleash powerful new subweapons. This is one adventure worth taking.
Platforms: Nintendo 64

Nintendo 64
, Adventure,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Goemon's Great Adventure
